data.name: API The Docs Portland 2020
data.description: On the 1st of May 2020 API The Docs is returning to the USA with a full-day single-track event in Portland (OR) to share and discuss the latest best practices, strategies and new trends relevant to API documentation and developer portals.

relatedRecords.name: ProgressNEXT 2020
relatedRecords.description: Join us in Boston, June 2020, to learn, connect with leaders and visionaries and thrive in a digital world. ProgressNEXT is the premier event for modern application development.

relatedRecords.name: Agile Games New England 2020 Conference
relatedRecords.description: We are excited to announce that Agile Games 2020 will be held June 1-3 at Boston University. This move allows us to continue growing in a space that allows this unique gathering to flourish.

relatedRecords.name: Apache DC Roadshow 2020
relatedRecords.description: ApacheCon and Apache Roadshow Events are the place to come learn what Apache projects are doing, as well as a place for projects to come build stronger project communities, and forge bonds between projects.
